packages.name: core-elements
packages.title: Core Elements
packages.description: Polymer's core elements are a set of visual and non-visual utility elements. They include elements for working with layout, user input, selection, and scaffolding apps.

core-ajax.name: core-ajax
core-ajax.description: The core-ajax element exposes XMLHttpRequest functionality.

core-toolbar.name: core-toolbar
core-toolbar.description: core-toolbar is a horizontal bar containing items that can be used for label, navigation, search and actions.
